title: intro type design workshops: Singapore, NYC
content:
Our loose anarcho-syndicalist collective brings its beginning type design workshops to Singapore (July 17–19, LaSalle College of the Arts) and New York City (July 20–21, Columbia University School of Journalism).

[http://craftingtype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414045801/http:/craftingtype.com/ "http://craftingtype.com/")

Please spread the word!
author: Thomas Phinney

comments.content:
Great to see this really taking flight.

hhp
Are you bringing these to London any time soon? Ever...? Hint hint...

Singapore is just about sold out. NYC not so much.

Several folks have suggested London. It is just a matter of finding an appropriate partner school or organization with space to host it.

Interesting that Singapore\* would do better than NYC. Maybe anybody into type in the latter already has his/her nose to the grindstone... :-) You should do one in Beirut too - I can hook you up with Khajag Apelian.

\* BTW I mentioned the workshop to my friend Karen Huang, and she signed up!

hhp
Yes, NYC does have a fair number of options for type design education already. But several people asked us, so there we went.
